publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4290 Ms Sandra White: Backpack for Malawi Appeal—That the Parliament applauds the "Backpack for Malawi" appeal, launched in Glasgow on 24 April 2006; recognises the effort that is being put in by pupils in Holyrood Secondary School, ten primary schools, two nurseries and two special educational needs schools; observes that the young people’s initiative will include the gathering of 2006 backpacks to be filled with useful items for youngsters in Africa; notes that they will also raise the money required to send them there, and sends its warmest congratulations to the young people for their resourcefulness, effort and common humanity of which their city and country should be proud.

S2M-4290 Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Rob Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Linda Fabiani*, Fergus Ewing*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Patrick Harvie*, Chris Ballance*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Bruce Crawford*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4290 Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Brian Adam*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*, Donald Gorrie*, Rosie Kane*

S2M-4290*#* Ms Sandra White: Backpack for Malawi Appeal—That the Parliament applauds the "Backpack for Malawi" appeal, launched in Glasgow on 24 April 2006; recognises the effort that is being put in by pupils in Holyrood Secondary School, ten primary schools, two nurseries and two special educational needs schools; observes that the young people’s initiative will include the gathering of 2006 backpacks to be filled with useful items for youngsters in Africa; notes that they will also raise the money required to send them there, and sends its warmest congratulations to the young people for their resourcefulness, effort and common humanity of which their city and country should be proud. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Mike Pringle, Linda Fabiani, Fergus Ewing, Eleanor Scott, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Frank McAveety, Christine Grahame, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Patrick Harvie, Chris Ballance, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Bruce Crawford, Shiona Baird, Brian Adam, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Dr Elaine Murray, Tommy Sheridan, Trish Godman, Donald Gorrie, Rosie Kane, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4290# Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-4290# Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4290# Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*, Nicola Sturgeon*
S2M-4290# Backpack for Malawi Appeal (lodged on 25 April 2006) Irene Oldfather*
